TVs.title: Samsung 55-inch 4K Crystal UHD Smart TV
TVs.description: 55-inch Crystal 4K UHD display, HDR10+, PurColor, Smart TV with built-in streaming apps, Dolby Digital Plus.

reviews.comment: Picture quality is amazing for the price. Colors really pop with HDR content.
Tizen OS works smoothly. Easy to connect with other smart devices.
Great for watching sports - fast motion looks smooth with minimal blur.

TVs.title: Sony Bravia 65-inch OLED 4K TV
TVs.description: 65-inch OLED panel with 4K HDR, Cognitive Processor XR, Triluminos Pro, Acoustic Surface Audio, Google TV built-in.

reviews.comment: The best picture quality I've ever seen. Perfect blacks and infinite contrast.
The Acoustic Surface Audio is revolutionary - sound comes directly from the screen!
Expensive but worth it if you want the absolute best TV technology.

TVs.title: LG 50-inch NanoCell 4K Smart TV
TVs.description: 50-inch NanoCell display with 4K resolution, α7 Gen5 AI processor, ThinQ AI, webOS smart platform, Dolby Vision IQ.

reviews.comment: NanoCell technology provides excellent color accuracy. Great alternative to OLED.
webOS is the best smart TV platform - intuitive and fast.
Low input lag makes this perfect for next-gen gaming consoles.

TVs.title: Samsung 32-inch HD LED Smart TV
TVs.description: 32-inch HD ready display, PurColor, Mega Contrast, Smart Hub, works with Alexa.

reviews.comment: Perfect size and quality for a bedroom TV. Smart features work well.
Great value for money. Picture is decent for HD content.
Works fine for casual viewing but not ideal for gaming due to response time.

TVs.title: Panasonic 43-inch LED 4K Smart TV
TVs.description: 43-inch LED 4K UHD display, HDR10, Smart features, Vivid Digital Pro, multiple HDMI ports.

reviews.comment: Panasonic quality is unmatched. This TV has been working flawlessly for years.
Perfect size for my apartment. 4K makes a noticeable difference even at this size.
Smart features are basic compared to Samsung or LG, but picture quality is good.

TVs.title: Mi 55-inch 4K Android LED TV
TVs.description: 55-inch 4K Ultra HD LED display, Android TV 11, PatchWall with Netflix and Prime Video, DTS-HD.

reviews.comment: Unbeatable price for a 55-inch 4K Android TV. Picture quality exceeds expectations.
Android TV gives access to all streaming apps. Google Assistant works well.
Picture is great but the plastic body feels a bit cheap compared to premium brands.

TVs.title: Sony 43-inch Full HD LED TV
TVs.description: 43-inch Full HD LED display, X-Reality PRO, Triluminos Display, Smart TV with Google Assistant.

reviews.comment: Sony's image processing is the best. Even HD content looks upscaled and sharp.
Sony TVs last forever. My previous one worked for 10+ years without issues.
Wish it was 4K at this price, but picture quality is excellent for Full HD.

reviews.comment: Massive screen with stunning picture quality. Perfect for movie nights.
120Hz refresh rate and HDMI 2.1 make this ideal for PS5 and Xbox Series X.
Make sure you have enough wall space - this TV is enormous!

reviews.comment: This is basically a home theater. The size and picture quality are jaw-dropping.
The Acoustic Multi-Audio system makes dialogue crystal clear without a soundbar.
Extremely expensive but you're paying for the absolute best home viewing experience.

reviews.comment: Blends perfectly with home decor in art mode. Guests often don't realize it's a TV!

You pay a premium for the design, but the picture quality is also excellent.
